description: You can now enjoy the essays from YC's The Macro, narrated by Amazon Alexa. It should be fun to listen to those essays while cooking/doing something else.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask The Macro to read an essay
Alexa, ask The Macro to tell me something about startups
Alexa, ask The Macro to help me learn about startups
imageAltText: Read essays from The Macro icon
name: Read essays from The Macro
shortDescription: A skill to read startup essays from YCombinator's The Macro (www.themacro.com)
